changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sessions ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, ip CIDR NOT NULL, user_agent TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(512 > LENGTH(user_agent)), operation_system TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(512 > LENGTH(operation_system)), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), last_activity TIMESTAMPTZ, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) );
